sentences: Nahid's career began in 1970 when she sang a duet with Khalid Asghar in "Raag Malhar" at Radio Pakistan Multan.
Her inaugural film "Nanha Farishta" was released in 1974 and in the same year she sang songs in film Shama (1974).
Initially it was said in the film circles that she was introduced to fill the vacuum of Runa Laila who had migrated to Bangladesh.
She was active in the Pakistani film industry all the way through the 1980s.
Nahid left singing in 1986.
Later, she married to a journalist Asif Ali Pota in 1994.

Naheed Akhtar made an appearance on stage in 2013, after repeated requests of the management of a TV show, where active and popular singers like Shabnam Majeed and Saima Jahan sang her songs to pay tribute to her.
She stays busy with her family and children, and as of 2016, is not actively pursuing a singing career.
